name: Mark as Unread when bringing window into focus

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
Mark as Unread when bringing window into focus
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Mark a channel as unread
  2. Click off of the browser/app
  3. Click back into the browser/app
inline.expectedResult: • The channel stays marked as unread until the user switches off the channel

customFields.Related ticket(s): Focusing window marks current channel as read, even when channel was marked as unread — MM-19491
